engagement-farming.name: Engagement Farming
engagement-farming.description: Accounts that post content specifically designed to maximize engagement metrics (likes, retweets, comments) through controversial takes, provocative questions, or emotional manipulation.

low-effort.name: Low Effort
low-effort.description: Content that requires minimal effort to create - includes screenshots of text, basic image macros, simple questions, or recycled content without original thought.

aislop.name: AI Slop
aislop.description: Low-quality AI-generated content including generic images, formulaic text, or AI-generated responses that lack originality or human insight.

cryptoslop.name: Crypto Slop
cryptoslop.description: Low-quality cryptocurrency-related content including scam coins, pump-and-dump schemes, repetitive crypto hype, or generic NFT promotion.

pdfslop.name: PDF Slop
pdfslop.description: Low-quality PDF content shared as screenshots or links - typically includes poorly formatted documents, generic PDFs, or unnecessary file attachments.

ai-maximalism.name: AI Maximalism
ai-maximalism.description: Accounts that promote excessive optimism about AI, claiming it will solve all problems or exaggerating AI capabilities without nuance or critical analysis.

ai-doomerism.name: AI Doomerism
ai-doomerism.description: Accounts that promote excessive pessimism about AI, claiming it will inevitably lead to human extinction or other catastrophic outcomes without balanced perspective.

ragebait.name: Ragebait
ragebait.description: Content specifically designed to provoke anger or outrage, including inflammatory takes, controversial statements, or posts meant to generate hostile reactions.

performative-slop.name: Performative Slop
performative-slop.description: Content that appears virtuous or insightful but is actually shallow, done for social approval rather than genuine understanding or action.

female-asian-founder-in-sf.name: Female Asian Founder in SF
female-asian-founder-in-sf.description: Accounts that fit the stereotypical pattern of female Asian founders in San Francisco who post generic startup content, tech bro aesthetics, or repetitive entrepreneurial narratives.

male-asian-founder-in-sf.name: Male Asian Founder in SF
male-asian-founder-in-sf.description: Accounts that fit the stereotypical pattern of male Asian founders in San Francisco who post generic startup content, tech bro aesthetics, or repetitive entrepreneurial narratives.

serial-grifter.name: Serial Grifter
serial-grifter.description: Accounts that repeatedly engage in scams, deceptive practices, or misleading claims to exploit followers for financial gain or social capital.

annoying-retard.name: Annoying Retard
annoying-retard.description: Accounts that post annoying, repetitive, or low-quality content that disrupts the feed without providing value.
